indications: adults sildenafil citrate phosphodiesterase-5 ( pde-5 ) inhibitor indicated treatment pulmonary arterial hypertension ( pah ) ( world health organization [ ] group ) adults improve exercise ability delay worsening . ( 1 )
warningsAndPrecautions: sildenafil 20 mg tablets usp white off-white , round biconvex film coated tablets debossed '85 ' one side plain side . overbagged 10 film coated tablets per bag , ndc 55154-4307-0 recommended storage sildenafil tablets usp : store 20°c 25°c ( 68°f 77°f ) ; excursions permitted 15°c 30°c ( 59°f 86°f ) [ usp controlled room temperature ] .
adverseReactions: • organic nitrates riociguat . ( 4 ) • history hypersensitivity reaction sildenafil component tablet . ( 4 )
name: SILDENAFIL
indications_original: Adults Sildenafil citrate is a phosphodiesterase-5 (PDE-5) inhibitor indicated for the treatment of pulmonary arterial hypertension (PAH) (World Health Organization [WHO] Group I) in adults to improve exercise ability and delay clinical worsening. ( 1 )
contraindications_original: • Adults: 20 mg three times a day. ( 2.1 )
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Sildenafil 20 mg tablets USP are white to off-white, round biconvex film coated tablets debossed with '85' on one side and plain on other side.
                  Overbagged with 10 film coated tablets per bag, NDC 55154-4307-0
                  Recommended Storage for Sildenafil Tablets USP: Store at 20°C to 25°C (68°F to 77°F); excursions permitted between 15°C and 30°C (59°F and 86°F) [see USP Controlled Room Temperature].
adverseReactions_original: • Use with organic nitrates or riociguat. ( 4 ) • History of hypersensitivity reaction to sildenafil or any component of the tablet. ( 4 )
